question: The quarterback drops back and throws the ball into the ground to avoid a sack. There is no eligible receiver in the area.
info: 10-yard penalty or loss of down at the spot of the foul, plus loss of down.

question: The left tackle moves before the ball is snapped, drawing the defense offsides.
info: 5-yard penalty, replay the down.

question: The defensive end jumps across the line of scrimmage and makes contact with the right guard before the snap.
info: 5-yard penalty, automatic first down if against the defense.

question: The cornerback grabs the receiver’s jersey before the ball is thrown, restricting his route.
info: 5-yard penalty and automatic first down.

question: The offense lines up with only six players on the line of scrimmage.
info: 5-yard penalty, replay the down.

question: The defensive back hits the receiver before the ball arrives, preventing the catch.
info: Spot foul and automatic first down.

question: The quarterback is hit hard after he has clearly released the ball.
info: 15-yard penalty and automatic first down.

question: The running back lowers his head and leads with the crown of the helmet into a defender.
info: 15-yard penalty, automatic first down if against defense.

question: The play clock runs out before the offense snaps the ball.
info: 5-yard penalty, replay the down.

question: On a kickoff, the ball does not travel 10 yards before the kicking team touches it.
info: Receiving team awarded possession at the spot of touching.

question: A receiver shoves the cornerback out of the way to make room for the catch.
info: 10-yard penalty from the previous spot and loss of down.

question: The center hikes the ball before the quarterback is ready, causing confusion.
info: 5-yard penalty, replay the down.

question: A defender grabs the quarterback’s facemask while making a sack.
info: 15-yard penalty and automatic first down.

question: Two players on offense are moving at the same time when the ball is snapped.
info: 5-yard penalty, replay the down.

question: A defensive player jumps early and is lined up in the neutral zone at the snap.
info: 5-yard penalty, automatic first down if against defense.

question: The punter is kicked into by a defender while his leg is still extended.
info: 5-yard penalty, replay the down. If severe, 15 yards and automatic first down (Roughing).

question: An offensive lineman grabs the outside of a defender’s shoulder pads to stop him.
info: 10-yard penalty, replay the down.

question: The quarterback throws the ball away outside the pocket, but it lands beyond the line of scrimmage.
info: No penalty — legal as long as the ball reaches the line of scrimmage.

question: A player spikes the football in front of an opponent after scoring a touchdown.
info: 15-yard penalty enforced on kickoff or extra point.

question: A defensive lineman tackles a blocker below the knees on a field goal attempt.
info: 15-yard penalty, automatic first down if on defense.

question: A wide receiver runs out of bounds on his own during a passing play and then comes back in to catch the ball.
info: Loss of down at the previous spot.

question: The defense commits holding on a wide receiver 7 yards downfield before the pass is thrown.
info: 5-yard penalty and automatic first down.

question: The offense doesn’t get the snap off in time and takes too long in the huddle.
info: 5-yard penalty, replay the down.

question: A quarterback crosses the line of scrimmage and then throws the ball.
info: 5-yard penalty from the spot of the foul and loss of down.

question: After a play, a player removes his helmet to yell at the referee.
info: 15-yard penalty, automatic first down if against defense.
